preface_p1: We beleive familiarity builds confidence. We believe simple and straightforward lessons are most effective. We consolidate all the resources you need one place so you do not have to distract yourself with endless Google searches. We believe that strengthening fundamentals are at the core of student success in the classroom.
preface_p2:
Chapters 1 thru 3 are an overview of the genercal chemistry concepts you will encounter in organic chemistry.
Chapters 4 thru 22 focus on the heart of organic chemistry: reactions and mechanism. There will also be some lab specific resources avalible help along the way.
